scripts.preinstall: test -d src/ui || (cd src/ && ng new --skip-git --skip-tests=true --routing=false --ssr=false --standalone ui && cd ui/ && ng add --skip-confirmation @angular/material)
scripts.lint: npm run license && eslint --fix --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern src/ test/
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run bundle
scripts.deploy: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build && ncp appsscript.json dist/appsscript.json && ncp .clasp-dev.json .clasp.json && npm run build-ui && npm run deploy-ui && clasp push -f
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build && ncp appsscript.json dist/appsscript.json && ncp .clasp-prod.json .clasp.json && npm run build-ui && npm run deploy-ui && clasp push
scripts.postinstall: npm run fix-animations && cd src/ui && npm install
